    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Trekant regel</string>
            <string language="en">triangle rule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieckrichtlinie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">règle de triangle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">régua do triângulo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">regola del triangolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κανόνας τριγώνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">regla del triángulo</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Utforsk effekt formelen og ohms lov ved hjelp av denne trekant regel illustrasjonen.</string>
            <string language="en">Explore the effect formula and ohm's law using the triangle rule illustration.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">ohms lov</string>
            <string language="en">Ohm's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">trekant regel</string>
            <string language="en">triangle rule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">effektformel</string>
            <string language="en">effect formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschen Sie das Effektformel- und -Ohmgesetz 
mit der Dreieckrichtlinie Abbildung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorez la loi de formule et d'ohm d'effet en 
utilisant l'illustration de règle de triangle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explore a lei da fórmula e do ohm do efeito 
usando a ilustração da régua do triângulo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplori la legge di formula e dell'Ohm di effetto
usando l'illustrazione di regola del triangolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνήστε το νόμο τύπου και του ωμ επίδρασης 
χρησιμοποιώντας την απεικόνιση κανόνα τριγώνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explore la ley del fórmula y del ohmio del efecto
usando la ilustración de la regla del triángulo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Ohms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieckrichtlinie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Effektformel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La loi de l'ohm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">règle de triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">formule d'effet</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lei do ohm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">régua do triângulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fórmula do efeito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legge dell'Ohm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">regola del triangolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formula di effetto</string>
          </keyword>
